title: Nick and Andy Play With Time In It Take Two I Kinda Funny Extra Life 2021
description:
Nick and Andy take over Kinda Funny Extra Life Day 2021 to play with time and continue to repair their relationship in It Takes Two! Remember Extra Life continues through the entire year so if you would like to donate and support those Big Beautiful Kids you can go to kindafunny.com/extralife anytime and contribute to our community's efforts.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
